academic.institute: IFB - Federal Institute of Education, Science and Technology of Brasília - Campus Brasília
academic.description: The course aims to train specialized professionals who are aware, ethical, and possess critical and reflective analysis skills to work in the development of programs, interfaces and applications, electronic commerce and marketing, as well as websites and portals for the Internet and Intranet. These professionals manage system projects, including access to databases, developing applications for the World Wide Web, and integrating media on websites.
